name: Roy H. LOMAS, Sr. d/b/a/ Roy Lomas Carpet Contractor, Respondent v. James B. KRAVITZ, Cherrydale Construction Company, Andorra Springs Development, Inc., and Kravmar, Inc., formerly known as Eastern Development Enterprises, Inc., Petitioners

parties: Roy H. LOMAS, Sr. d/b/a/ Roy Lomas Carpet Contractor, Respondent v. James B. KRAVITZ, Cherrydale Construction Company, Andorra Springs Development, Inc., and Kravmar, Inc., formerly known as Eastern Development Enterprises, Inc., Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of June, 2009, the Application for Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
973 A.2d 414
Roy H. LOMAS, Sr. d/b/a/ Roy Lomas Carpet Contractor, Respondent v. James B. KRAVITZ, Cherrydale Construction Company, Andorra Springs Development, Inc., and Kravmar, Inc., formerly known as Eastern Development Enterprises, Inc., Petitioners.
No. 68 MM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 3, 2009.
